articles.title: Andriy Shevchenko: Former Ukraine striker on Lionel Messi, Harry Kane and war in his homeland
articles.description: Andriy Shevchenko says Lionel Messi deserves to win World Cup when Argentina play France in final; former Chelsea striker backs Harry Kane to bounce back from penalty miss in Englands quarter-final defeat; Shevchenko continuing to lobby for support for Ukraine after Russia invasion
articles.content:
Andriy Shevchenko says Lionel Messi is the best player there has ever been and it would be a fitting finale to his career if he were to lift the World Cup on Sunday.

articles.title: France players hit by colds as Argentina final looms
articles.description: Coach Didier Deschamps refused to panic after Wednesday's game and said they were being careful to ensure the illness did not spread.
articles.content:
Several France players have caught colds, the French Football Federation said, as they prepare for the World Cup final against Argentina, with Raphael Varane and Ibrahima Konate the latest to fall ill on Friday.

articles.title: Argentina v France: where the World Cup final could be won and lost
articles.description: Lionel Messi and Kylian Mbappé loom large but other tactical elements, including the role of Rodrigo De Paul, may be crucial
articles.content:
Stopping Messi
For better or for worse, this was always going to be the tournament of Lionel Messi. If he fails to win the World Cup, the shadow lies across his career, a sense of destiny unfulfilled. If he wins, it is a glorious culmination. So far,... [6154 chars]

articles.title: Lionel Messi’s hometown in Argentina yearns for World Cup win
articles.description: Fans from all over the world come to visit Lionel Messi’s old home and the small soccer field where he learned the skills that would eventually turn him into an all-time great.
articles.content:
article
Fernanda Quiroga still remembers how Lionel Messi played soccer in what were then dirt roads around their working class neighborhood in Rosario, Argentina’s third-largest city.
